initGroupNew: Great, the chat has been successfully registered, let the game begin, here is the first waifu
initGroupExist: The bot has already been started in this group.
initPrivate: Hello {{name}}, here you can see your harem and spend your points in the store.
waifuSender: Add them to your harem by sending /protecc character name
waifuScape: Oh no, **{{waifuName}}** from **{{franchiseName}}** has runner crying.

waifuProtectAge.zero: Do you know how old he is?
waifuProtectAge.one: You're catching a minor, someone call the police.
waifuProtectAge.two: You're catching an almost legal minor, someone call the police.
waifuProtectAge.three: You're catching a legit, there's nothing weird around here
waifuProtectAge.other: You're catching a legit, I didn't know you liked the majors

waifuProtectType.zero: Look at the size of those oppais.
waifuProtectType.one: How does she endure those mountains?
